section.title: What is an automated installation?
section.para: As an addition to the interactive installation described in , &dinstaller; supports an unattended automated installation.

section.title: How does an automated installation work?
section.para: &dinstaller; supports the following types of unattended installation:

listitem.para: This type of installation uses a customized file called profile that includes a description of the system to install.
This type of installation uses a plain shell script that enables custom pre-installation workflows.
You can prepare installation setup in advance and modify it easily for future deployments.
By running an unattended installation, you can save the time that you would normally spend in the interactive installation process.
After fine-tuning the installation profile, you can deploy multiple hosts at the same time to meet datacenter requirements.
